name: A Corny Christmas
description:
Hello this is the first game that I've ever released. This was released for the Godot Wild Jam #40. The programming and sound was done by myself and the art assets were created by my fiance u/kittyheadpats. The font used was provided by https://nimblebeastscollective.itch.io/magosfonts.

Project files can be found here: https://github.com/RealAlseus/ACornyChristmas
